name: Breaking Bones
description: Breaking Bones is a survival game using the technology of photogrammetry. It's a First Person Melee game with some shooting component. Travel the world through quarries, islands, forests, mountains, deserts and more. Fight skeletons, dragons and dinosaurs. At your disposal a large number of deadly weapons, catapults and bows.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
